name: Orbital Space Puppy Rescue
description:
My first game posted to itch.io! It's still in development but I'm proud of it. I started learning code and unity over Christmas break and I've been having a lot of fun with it.

In this game you are a space pilot on a mission to save your space puppies from the bad space Octoboys, but there is only one problem, you are really bad at turning. something's wrong with your ship, I don't know. luckily you have some kind of cool gravitational device on your ship that you can use to help steer. 

Here's how you play
WASD or ArrowKeys: Steering and Thrust / Brake

Space or LeftShift: Toggle Gravity On planets 

In the future I'll add sound probably and more levels and animations
